column5: I've lurked here long enough that I figure I should probably introduce myself.  I live down in Haldimand County. Don't get out fishing nearly enough these days, but having young kids does that to you. Just started to take the oldest out fishing with me in the evenings this past summer - he loves it.  A number of years ago I took up fly fishing - mostly for bass and panfish. Although my catch percentage is worse than when I'm spin fishing I still love it. Especially using older click-pawl reels and fiberglass rods. Just plain fun. I've rebuilt one fiberglass rod and am currently finishing up a second one.  Enough yakking, here's some pictures of what I enjoy.   Clouser Deep Minnows - for the Smallies   Rebuilding an old Herter's rod   Matched up with a JW Young Pridex   Good match for these guys   Current Project   The other hobby  Hopefully I can find a way to contribute here, maybe meet some new people.
Welcome Tom, nice intro!
Nice!!!!  Welcome aboard!
Welcome aboard nice intro! And the bacon wrapped whatever it is looks awesome!
Is that porketta?  What's your address, I'll be right over!   Welcome to OFC.
Welcome, great pics!
welcome aboard, I'm officially hungry. Great pics...
Oh yeah, cop out with bacon wrapped pics instead of giant fish pics
Oh yeah, cop out with bacon wrapped pics instead of giant fish pics  My only response to that is .... bacon.
Its a tie...???  There is a food thread btw.  Looks like you can add some fishing porn and food porn!
Bacon, now that's just cheating!  Welcome and thanks for the great pics! You do nice work.......I'm still talking about the bacon. LOL
WELCOME and that looks like some good lookin bait

My only response to that is .... bacon. Well played sir, well played....  Nice intro and cool looking flies. Add to your profile where you are located and I'm sure you will notice a few others in your area on here too
Its a tie...    Nah, Tom wins round 1
I concur.........  Welcome bacon master!
Great stuff, welcome!
Bacon is amazing, but not chris brock caliber IMO
Famly man, craftsman, fisherman, cook, what more could you ask for? Welcome to OFC!

I disagree. You fell through the ice, got out and landed a fish.  Bacon is amazing, but not chris brock caliber IMO That's signature material.  I'm going to counter with a triple bacon threat, but I'm not sure it's enough to out do a dunking. The greatest danger I was in was from grease stains....
LOL!! I freaking love this guy!
....... True that!  Chris is the OFC NINJA!
Looks fantasic!!!
